title: Sourdough & Breads
description: Artisanal slow-fermented loaves and daily staples.

title: French Pastries
description: Buttery croissants, pains au chocolat, and delicate danishes.

title: Custom Cakes
description: Handcrafted cakes for weddings, birthdays, and celebrations.

title: Cookies & Sweet Treats
description: Small bites, chewy cookies, and seasonal confections.

title: Savory Sandwiches
description: Fresh lunch options made with our house-baked bread.

title: Seasonal Specials
description: Limited time flavors inspired by the current harvest.
